mapper.sql: id, parent_id, name, url, code, type, sort, create_time, update_time, is_deleted
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT ap.id,ap.parent_id,ap.name,ap.url,ap.code,ap.type,ap.sort,ap.create_time,ap.update_time,ap.is_deleted FROM acl_admin_role aar LEFT JOIN acl_role_permission arp ON aar.role_id = arp.role_id LEFT JOIN acl_permission ap ON arp.permission_id = ap.id WHERE aar.admin_id = #{adminId} AND aar.is_deleted = 0 AND arp.is_deleted = 0 AND ap.is_deleted = 0
